title: When I call you over, you come
body: I don't see why this is so difficult for Junglers and Supports to understand...you don't deserve free will. You live to serve me.

replies.body: What? its hard to hear muted people.
_spam pings_
The truth
All hail the ADC master race.
All hail the not-JG/Sup master race.
Hail.
"Noob support why aren't you at top lane helping me?"

hilarious
upvoted
I just upvoted your upvote because you upvoted my upvote and now we're nude.

i don't know what just happened
guess i'll upvote some moar
Upvote me anymore and I may replicate {{champion:53}}'s ult {{champion:267}} style.

Like this?
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/102/013/Ariel_I_CAME.jpg
-Said every mid and ADC main ever (Top lane mains are content just to sit back and farm).
Hell yeah. I just get pissed at my jungler for ganking and giving enemy top a kill while I have my lane under control.
I've actually had top laners get mad at me when I gank and get them a kill.  I'm just like out team is +1 why are you mad.
This is our island. Get out you stupid normie.

not to be sour but from an analytical point, did you die or did bottom lane die at that point?  it can get frustrating...it's why I don't play jungler

I wish the lanes would go back to 2 - 1 - 2 instead of junglers being a necessity

though I can understand the frustration AS a jungler too...I played evelynn jungler once and literally had to stay in lane with top lane because they would have died 4x 5 minutes in and I even gave them a kill, the only cost being 1 level for the enemy

then, they pretty much just shout for me to leave...so I do...they die less than a minute later, yay team!  XD
nope...was a perfectly successful gank.  lost nothing but it broke their focus off of farming for 30 seconds and they are angry about it.

ADC-Support relation is like a child with his mommy. As an ADC you can;t do anything alone and you need to wait for your mommy's/Support's permission to move. If you cross the street alone you might die, got it?

...but if you go up an escalator, she'll die.

(( This is a terrible joke and you should downvote the hell out of it...unless you have cyanide in your veins. If you don't know what I'm referring to, Google it. Then come back and tell me how much of a horrible person I am. Or don't. I feel bad for making this joke. ))

I'l just trust you on this one and downvote it. But some mom's suck of cours,e because they are addicted to crack or are sleeping with uncle Jerry. But in most cases you should listen to your mommy/support

Hey, this is America.

And in America, white parents follow their children's orders and blame society.
Looks like that backfired on you.
Honestly, the sole fact he decided to press "Post" backfired at him.
The funnier part is that he thought Char was serious.

you should try BDSM
I have. Why else would I know a submissive when I saw one?
{{champion:429}} Going somewhere else? Not anymore.

I will never bow to a tyrant.

(except {{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}})
Geralt, is that you?
The Butcher of Blaviken
http://i.imgur.com/YtgS2qK.gif
Clam down there, Kalista.
Every team consists of 3 players and 2 tools.
Just call them by their politocal correct names, Top-laner and adc
Poli- what?
Ups typo, sue me
{{champion:119}}, there might be two other players on this team, but you work for *me.*

yes, because we all live and serve our mighty ADC overlords that feed 0/6 by 10 minutes, calling us to them while we are dealing with something important or its impossible for us to get to them

oh, then there are the people who have no idea how long some cooldowns are, like the 90+ second cooldown of heal, the typical 10+ seconds for an ability heal (not everyone is soraka or sona)

yes, mighty vayne, it is clearly my fault you died when I am OOM and you dive in against the enemies that have caused that and you used your E to engage instead of to save yourself in this terrible scenario
{{champion:16}}-lol adcs don't understand that i keep them alive so they are my meat puppets and when i see jump the only thing they should ask is "how high?"
HEY TOP LANE! YOU GOT A NEW PARTNER! "But you are m-**AN ALLY HAS BEEN SLAIN!**"
But if im the ADC, the ENTIRE team are my supports. They must all bow before me and kiss my feet and bring me food when I am hungry. THEY SHOULD KNOW WHAT I WANT BEFORE I DO!
when im {{champion:16}} i'm the team patron god keeping them all alive so they must all praise me and kneel to me
Someday Riot will invent a champ that can travel through games just to help you out mate.

Serve you?  Punk, be grateful I don't take all of your farm as part of my jungle route.  You want a gank?  Then stop shoving lane and actually set up for me!  Why have I ganked top three times already?  Because top actually knows how to set up for and respond to a gank unlike your tower shoving butt.
Oh you think all of us are just youre hoes who do what your want, well Naw me man. {{champion:267}}
You forgot your /s
